targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  continent AS metric,
  count(cid) AS "requests"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY 1, continent,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  continent AS metric,
  avg(request_time) AS "requests"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY 1, continent,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  continent AS metric,
  avg(upstream_time) AS "requests"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY 1, continent,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  country AS metric,
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY country
order by country

SELECT
  count(distinct cid) as "Distinct"
FROM requests r 
where $__timeFilter("timestamp")

SELECT
  count(cid) as "Total"
FROM requests r 
where $__timeFilter("timestamp")

SELECT
  p.country AS metric,
  count(p.cid) AS "count"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY 1
order by 1

SELECT
  p.country AS metric,
  count(distinct p.peerId) AS "count"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY 1
order by 1

SELECT
  count(distinct peerId) as "Providers"
FROM providers p join requests r on p.cid = r.cid
where $__timeFilter("timestamp")

SELECT
  count(distinct p.cid) as "Distinct"
FROM providers p join requests r on p.cid = r.cid
where $__timeFilter("timestamp")

SELECT
  count(p.cid) as "Total"
FROM providers p join requests r on p.cid = r.cid
where $__timeFilter("timestamp")

SELECT
  count(*) as "All"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(*) as "With location"
FROM requests 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and continent is not NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(*) as "W/out location"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and continent is NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct p.peerId) as "All"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct p.peerId) as "With location"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and p.continent is not NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct p.peerId) as "W/out location"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and p.continent is NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  r.continent as "Requesters",
  p.continent as "Providers",
  count(*) as "Requests"
FROM requests r join Providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and r.continent is not Null and p.continent is not Null
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  r.continent as "Requesters",
  p.continent as "Providers",
  count(*) as "Requests"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  continent as "Requesters",
  count(*) as "Requests"
FROM requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
   $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
   count(p.cid) as "Local CIDs"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and
  r.continent = p.continent
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
   count(p.cid) as "Non-Local CIDs"
FROM requests r join providers p on r.cid = p.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and
  r.continent != p.continent
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  p.cid as "Content",
  count(distinct p.peerId) as "Replicas"
FROM providers p join requests r on p.cid = r.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 desc

SELECT
  p.cid as "Content",
  count(distinct p.peerId) as "Replicas"
FROM providers p join requests r on p.cid = r.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and p.continent = r.continent
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 desc

panels.title: Replica CID in the same region

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  p.cid as "Content",
  count(distinct p.peerId) as "Replicas"
FROM providers p join requests r on p.cid = r.cid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and p.continent != r.continent
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 desc
